thread.title: It’s selfie time on the sets of AKK
thread.title_full: It’s selfie time on the sets of AKK - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: It’s selfie time on the sets of AKK
text:
It looks like the team of Adi Kapyare Kootamani is having a gala selfie time on the sets.
Fun pictures of Dhyan Sreenivasan, Aju Varghese, Neeraj Madhav, Vinay Jose and Vijay Babu, along with the team were posted online.
Going by the youthful mood of the film, Dhyan has the quintessential selfie expression in the photographs.
